Trade/Device Name(s): First Sign Drug of Abuse MDMA Cup Test
First Sign Drug of Abuse MDMA Dip Card Test
First Sign Drug of Abuse EDDP Cup Test
First Sign Drug of Abuse EDDP Dip Card Test
First Sign Drug of Abuse Nortriptyline Cup Test
First Sign Drug of Abuse Nortriptyline Dip Card Test
Document Summary: FDA 510(k) summary for First Sign Drug of Abuse MDMA, EDDP, and Nortriptyline urine lateral flow immunoassay tests in cup and dip card formats for over-the-counter and prescription use.
Indications for Use Summary: Qualitative, preliminary detection of MDMA, EDDP, or Nortriptyline in human urine for over-the-counter or prescription use; results should be confirmed by a more specific chemical method such as GC/MS.
